MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the G14 postcode area of Glasgow, affecting properties in Stronvar Drive and surrounding areas. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 7.21pm. Our engineers have arrived in the local area and are investigating the cause of the fault. Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 10.30pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 7.54pm on Friday 26 March 2021.
